    org.springframework.security.oauth2.provider.endpoint

  • org.springframework.security.oauth2.config.annotation.web.configurers使用的org.springframework.security.oauth2.provider.error中的类 
    类和说明
    WebResponseExceptionTranslator 
  • org.springframework.security.oauth2.provider.endpoint使用的org.springframework.security.oauth2.provider.error中的类 
    类和说明
    WebResponseExceptionTranslator 
  • org.springframework.security.oauth2.provider.error使用的org.springframework.security.oauth2.provider.error中的类 
    类和说明
    AbstractOAuth2SecurityExceptionHandler
    Convenient base class containing utility methods and dependency setters for security error handling concerns specific to OAuth2 resources.
    OAuth2ExceptionRenderer
    Strategy for rendering a OAuth2Exception in cases where they cannot be rendered by the Spring dispatcher servlet (i.e. usually in a filter chain).
    WebResponseExceptionTranslator
